---
title: "senators"
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
---

```{r}
library(gt)

# read the first sheet of your Excel file
senators <- read.csv("files/csvs/senator_list.csv")

senators$Profile <- paste0("[View Profile](files/pdfs/role profiles/district_", senators$District, "_profile.pdf)")

senators$Page <- paste0("[Page](senator-pages/district_", senators$District, ".html)")

# simple nice table with kableExtra
senators %>%
  gt() %>%
  fmt_markdown(columns = c("PDF", "Page")) %>%
  tab_header(
    title = "Senators",
    subtitle = "Click to view senator profile or activity"
  )
```
